fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.tblContAcct.Row1.getContactFromEAM"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({ \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID_EAMID\\": eamid.value\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID()\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data.contactid:\\" + data.contactid);\\n contactid.value = data.contactid;\\n if (data === 'null') {\\n console.log(\\"--> Contact is null\\");\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = true;\\n txPleaseEnterInvite.visible = true;\\n } else {\\n var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({ \\"contactid\\": contactid.value\\n });\\n console.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n $.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceciexecuteDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET contact /contacts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid:\\" + data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].firstname:\\" + data[0].firstname); console.log(\\"data[0].lastname:\\" + data[0].lastname);\\n Row2.firstname.value = data[0].firstname;\\n Row2.lastname.value = data[0].lastname;\\n accountid.value = data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\, async: false\\n });\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\, async: false\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextdraw._value: According to our records, this is the first time logging into Global Affairs Canada via GCkey. Your contact information must be linked to your GCkey in order to continue.

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress\\": emailaddress.value\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"gac_GetContactByEmail()\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data);\\n if (data === 'null') {\\n console.log(\\"Contact is null:\\"+contactid.value);\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n noemailexists.visible = true;\\n registernew.visible = true;\\n registernew.enabled = true;\\n }\\n else {\\n console.log(\\"Email Found-contactID: \\"+data.contactid);\\n contactid.value = data.contactid; \\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"contactid\\"\, data.contactid);\\n noemailexists.visible = false;\\n invitecode.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = false;\\n txInvite.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true; }\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) { console.log(\\"setContact -error\\"); }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"var redeemOperationArgs = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contact_contactid\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"contactid\\")\,\\n// \\"contact_contactid\\": contactid.value\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_InviteCode\\": invitecode.value\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_EAMID\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\")\,\\n// \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_EAMID\\": eamid.value\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_TargetPortalApplication\\": \\"CECI\\"\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"redeemOperationArgs \\" + redeemOperationArgs);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"contacts/Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.gac_RedeemInviteCode()\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": redeemOperationArgs\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data);\\n txMsgRedeemSuccess.visible = true;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n this.visible = false;\\n invitecode.enable = false;\\n this.enable = false;\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) { console.log(\\"setContact -error\\"); }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.RedeemInviteCode"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.wnatToCancel"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"if (this.value == \\"1\\") {\\n window.open('https://pi.international.gc.ca/pages/public/welcome-accueil.xhtml'\,'_self');\\n}\\nelse{\\n cancelConfirmationPanel.visible = false;\\n if(previousNamePanel.value === 'section1'){\\n section1.visible = true;\\n }\\n else{\\n section2.visible = true;\\n }\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.button1605834621499"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"button1605834621499"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"IS_EMPTY"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":null}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SET_VALUE_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"VALUE_FIELD"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.button1605834621499"\,"displayName":"Button"\,"type":"STRING"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/Cancel Confirmation/section/Button/"\,"name":"button1605834621499"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section"}}\,{"nodeName":"to"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.panel1605031253438.table1604508371591.Row1.eamid"\,"displayName":"eamid"\,"type":"STRING"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/pnlFrageamid2/Section/Table/Row 1/eamid/"\,"name":"eamid"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.panel1605031253438.table1604508371591.Row1"}}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n * WHEN Button is changed AND (Button is empty) THEN Set value of Button to eamid\\n *\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (( this.value === null || this.value === \\"\\" )) {\\n this.value = eamid.value;\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"eamid.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\");\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"foprofileid\\"\, \\"68995D00-B104-EB11-96A4-00505681CF84\\");\\nvar vEamid = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\");\\nvar ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({ \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID_EAMID\\": vEamid\\n}); console.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID()\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) { console.log(data); console.log(\\"data.contactid:\\" + data.contactid);\\n contactid.value = data.contactid;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"contactid\\"\, data.contactid);\\n if (data === 'null') { console.log(\\"--> Contact is null\\");\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = true;\\n txPleaseEnterInvite.visible = true;\\n } else {\\n var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contactid\\": contactid.value\\n });\\n console.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n $.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET contact /contacts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid:\\" + data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid); console.log(\\"data[0].firstname:\\" + data[0].firstname); \\n Row2.firstname.value = data[0].firstname;\\n tblContAcct.Row1.fullname.value = data[0].fullname;\\n tblContAcct.Row2.accountid.value = data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"accountid\\"\, data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n var accountOperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"accountid\\": tblContAcct.Row2.accountid.value\\n });\\n console.log(\\"accountOperationArguments: \\" + accountOperationArguments);\\n $.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET account /accounts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": accountOperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_operatingname_en\\" + data[0].egcs_operatingname_en);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].accountid\\" + data[0].accountid);\\n tblContAcct.Row2.egcs_operatingname_en.value = data[0].egcs_operatingname_en;\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n var vDraftId = getDraftId(sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\, sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofileid\\"));\\n if ((vDraftId === null || vDraftId === \\"\\")) {tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Start\\";}\\n else {\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Edit\\";\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, vDraftId);\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"ERROR-GETaccountData - Click\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n });\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n });\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
